ygData.subject: Re: Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: You still didn t answer my question, fellas.... if it s LORE ITEM then what do you do with the Stein you already have?  give it to someone to hold? Also, is
ygData.messageBody:
You still didn't answer my question, fellas....

if it's LORE ITEM then what do you do with the Stein you already
have? give it to someone to hold?

Also, is the Book NO DROP or just LORE? I forget....


I'd like to complete this quest again to sell one....I need the cash
badly to work on my jewelry some more...I spent over 200pp last night and
went from 43 to 48 in Jewelry. ouch!! that hurts!!




From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...> on 08/16/99 07:56 AM PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Stein

From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>

The steins are selling for 1500 on Eci.
